Package mil.nga.geopackage.db

Class TableMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.geopackage.db.TableMapping
  • public class TableMapping
extends Object
    Mapping between column names being mapped to and the mapped column information

    3.3.0
    Author:
    osbornb
